CustomField.inlineHelpText: The PoD Id format. Places groups of numbers in the desired format and uses regex capture groups as placeholders. Include prefix if applicable. Ex: for PoD Ids formatted XXX-XXX-XX the POD Id Format value is $1-$2-$3., for PoD Ids with the prefix R01 and formatted R01-XXX-XXX the POD Id Format value is R01-$1-$2.
CustomField.label: POD Id Format
